sentences.en: Complaints have led to (a) simplification of the rules.
sentences.cn: 因为人们的抱怨，规则简化了。

sentences.en: Everyone favours the simplification of court procedures.
sentences.cn: 人人都赞成法庭程序的简化。

sentences.en: Any doctor who has wrestled with multiple forms from different insurers, or patients who have tried to understand their own parade of statements, know that simplification ought to save money.
sentences.cn: 任何一位曾与来自不同保险公司的多个表格搏斗过的医生，或试图理解自己的一系列结算单的病人，都知道简化程序应该能省钱。
